articles.content: Motorolas phones have always had a wow factor and the recently launched Edge+ ascertains that once more. The Edge+ is a return for Motorola to the premium smartphone space after a long gap but it has managed to get most of the things right. Great specificatio… [+2437 chars]

articles.title: AirPods Studio will blow away Bose with these killer features - Tom's Guide
articles.description: AirPods Studio will get ear and neck detection to challenge rival headphones from Bose and Sony
articles.content:
Apples AirPods Studio over-ear headphones are set to offer a lot more than noise cancellation. According to a new report, you can expect neck and ear detection, as well as other special features that could put the likes of Bose and Sony on notice.
The report… [+1962 chars]

articles.title: Porsche brings in 911 Turbo S to India at ₹3.08 crore, opens booking - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The deliveries of the 911 Turbo S to its new customers is likely to start towards end of 2020 due to uncertainty prevailing given the current situation.
articles.content:
Porsche India has opened the order books for the 911 Turbo S. The sports car has been priced at Rs. 3.08 crore (ex-showroom).
Porsche has also opened online booking of the 911 Turbo S through Porsche Indias official website. It now offers customisation of th… [+1734 chars]

articles.title: Twitter makes it easier for iPhone users to see retweets with comments - Hindustan Times
articles.description: iPhone users can now check all their retweets with comments, photos, videos and GIFs in one place.
articles.content:
Twitter is making it easier for users to see who quoted and retweeted their tweets. This feature is however available only to iOS users for now. 
Twitter lets users simply retweet tweets or add comments along with it. Users can also retweet with photos, vide… [+1142 chars]
